column4: I am considering to buy a notebook. I am between Dell Inspiron 6000 and Ibm Thinkpad z60m. Any advice ( i would like to install ubuntu on it)
Using an IBM here, and it seems pretty happy with Linux.
Also, Google on laptops, there are 3 or so sites that maintain reports of success/failure on different models.
They usually have everything organized in a list, so you can scan for Ubuntu on them.
